monsters.name: Bronze Automaton
monsters.description: A mechanical guardian crafted from bronze, powered by ancient magic.

attacks.name: Bronze Fist
attacks.description: A heavy bronze fist slams down!

specialAbilities.name: Immutable Form
specialAbilities.description: Immune to effects that would alter its form.

specialAbilities.name: Blazing Shell
specialAbilities.description: When hit by fire damage, body heats up. Next melee attack deals extra 2d6 fire damage.

flavorText: Metal grinds against metal as an automaton activates!
Ancient magic pulses - a bronze guardian stands to defend!
The mechanical sentinel's eyes glow with arcane power!
monsters.defeatedText: The automaton's movements slow and stop, magic fading from its core.

monsters.name: War Chariot Rider
monsters.description: An elite warrior mounted on a bronze-reinforced war chariot.

attacks.name: Bronze Spear
attacks.description: A gleaming bronze spear thrusts forward!

specialAbilities.name: Charge Attack
specialAbilities.description: If moves 30+ feet and hits with spear, deals extra 2d8 damage.

specialAbilities.name: Bronze Armor
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing.

flavorText: Thunder and dust! A war chariot bears down on you!
The rattle of wheels and armor - a chariot warrior charges!
Bronze gleams in the sun as an elite rider attacks!
monsters.defeatedText: The chariot crashes and splinters, the warrior tumbling to the ground.

monsters.name: Bull of Heaven
monsters.description: A massive divine bull with bronze-tipped horns, sent as punishment by the gods.

attacks.name: Gore
attacks.description: Divine horns tear through flesh and armor alike!

attacks.name: Trample
attacks.description: Massive hooves crush everything beneath them!

specialAbilities.name: Divine Wrath
specialAbilities.description: All attacks count as magical. Critical hits on 19-20.

specialAbilities.name: Earthquake Stomp
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, stomps ground. All creatures within 20 feet must succeed DC 16 DEX save or be knocked prone and take 3d8 bludgeoning damage.

flavorText: The earth trembles - a divine bull descends from the heavens!
Bronze-tipped horns gleam as the Bull of Heaven roars its fury!
The gods have sent their champion - prepare for divine judgment!
monsters.defeatedText: The divine bull bellows one final time before its spirit returns to the heavens.

monsters.name: Bronze Serpent
monsters.description: A massive serpent with scales like bronze plates, impossibly heavy and strong.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: Fangs dripping with venom sink deep! (DC 15 CON save or take 4d6 poison damage)

attacks.name: Constrict
attacks.description: Coils wrap around you, crushing with terrible force!

specialAbilities.name: Bronze Scales
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from non-magical attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Grappler
specialAbilities.description: When hits with constrict, target is grappled (escape DC 15). While grappled, target is restrained and takes 2d10 crushing damage at start of serpent's turn.

flavorText: A metallic scraping - a bronze serpent slithers forward!
Coils thick as tree trunks - a metal serpent prepares to strike!
The air fills with the smell of hot metal as the serpent attacks!
monsters.defeatedText: The bronze serpent's coils relax as it falls still, scales dulling.

monsters.name: Temple Guardian
monsters.description: An elite warrior sworn to protect sacred places, blessed by the gods.

attacks.name: Bronze Khopesh
attacks.description: A curved bronze blade slashes viciously!

attacks.name: Shield Bash
attacks.description: A heavy bronze shield smashes forward!

specialAbilities.name: Divine Protection
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, when reduced to 0 HP, drops to 1 HP instead.

specialAbilities.name: Sacred Ground
specialAbilities.description: While defending temple or sacred area, has advantage on all saving throws.

flavorText: You have defiled sacred ground! A temple guardian attacks!
Bronze armor gleaming with divine light - a blessed warrior blocks your path!
The gods' champion stands ready to defend this holy place!
monsters.defeatedText: The guardian falls, whispering prayers as their duty ends.

monsters.name: Sphinx
monsters.description: A creature with a human head, lion body, and eagle wings - guardian of secrets.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.description: Powerful lion claws rake across you!

attacks.name: Riddle's Curse
attacks.description: Mental anguish from failing the riddle! (DC 16 INT save to negate)

specialAbilities.name: Inscrutable
specialAbilities.description: Immune to divination and mind-reading effects.

specialAbilities.name: Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: Can cast: Detect Magic, Dispel Magic, Tongues, Legend Lore. Spell save DC 16.

flavorText: A sphinx descends, eyes gleaming with ancient intelligence!
Answer the riddle or face your doom - the sphinx speaks!
Wings spread wide, the guardian of mysteries prepares to test you!
monsters.defeatedText: The sphinx's eyes dim as ancient secrets die with it.
